title: Marketplace Roundtable #19: A Unique Approach To Trading Markets With The Equity Management Academy
description: Patrick MontesDeOca founded The Equity Management Academy with the belief that "regular" investors could learn to trade like "Pros" when given the right tools. Patrick and Director of Research Dr. Scot Macdonald's accrued knowledge is embodied in the fully automated proprietary trading program, Variable Changing Price Momentum Indicator (VC PMI). They offer subscribers to their SA Marketplace service, Mean Reversion Trading, regular reports and trading alerts on the S&P 500 E-mini, gold and silver.
itunes:title: The Equity Management Academy's Unique Approach To Trading Markets
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Equity Management Academy founder and CEO Patrick MontesDeOca discusses his unique approach to trading key markets such as the S&P 500 E-mini, gold and silver
